keyMoments.title: Shadow Implantation into Oars
keyMoments.description: Gecko Moria uses his Kage Kage no Mi powers to forcibly implant Luffy's stolen shadow into the corpse of Oars, demonstrating the full extent of his shadow manipulation abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the advanced application of the Kage Kage no Mi - not just stealing shadows but strategically placing them into powerful corpses to create ultimate zombies.

abilities.name: Shadow Theft
abilities.description: The user can steal the shadows of living beings, leaving them vulnerable to sunlight.

abilities.name: Shadow Implantation
abilities.description: The user can implant stolen shadows into corpses to create zombies that inherit the shadow donor's personality and abilities.

abilities.name: Shadow Control
abilities.description: The user can manipulate shadows and force them to obey commands.

weaknesses.description: Salt can purify zombies created with stolen shadows, forcing the shadows out of the corpses.
The personality and memories from implanted shadows gradually wear away over time.

keyMoments.title: Absalom Uses Invisibility to Abduct Nami
keyMoments.description: Absalom uses his Suke Suke no Mi powers to turn himself and Nami invisible, allowing him to kidnap her while evading Usopp's attacks.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates how Absalom uses his invisibility for stealth kidnapping and evasion.

abilities.name: Invisibility
abilities.description: The user can turn themselves and anything they touch completely invisible.

abilities.name: Stealth Attacks
abilities.description: The user can launch surprise attacks while remaining invisible.
